name: Jokes Widget
author: Michael Jentsch

sections.description: The jokes widget makes it possible to inserted selected jokes into your blog and display the jokes in a widget.
sections.installation:
1. Upload jokes.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Unzip the jokes.zip file
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Use the widget like any other widget. (Screenshots)
sections.faq:
How many jokes could I put in the widget?

You can put up to 20 jokes in the jokes widget.

Is the jokes widget available in english?

No, the jokes are in german language.

Can I remove the link in the widget footer?

Yes you can, but you need to edit the php code. There is no configuration setting for that.

short_description: The jokes widget will display german jokes in a widget
description: The jokes widget makes it possible to inserted selected jokes into your blog and display the jokes in a widget.

screenshots.caption: The jokes widget in the "Available Widget" area.
If you drag the widget in the sidebar, it will appear in the widget sidebar.
You can open the configuration dialog of the widget and configure the settings for your blog.
